overview: Cowgirl Jill has enemies on both sides of the law. Fellow law-dodger Eli wants her head; Sheriff Luke wants her neck; and bounty hunter Cody wants ass to sell to whoever will pay. At a gallows stand-off Jill trades Eli's whereabouts for a bandit's reprieve, and now it's up to her and Cody to track down oath-breaker Eli and defend their frontier town. It will take more than a lick and a promise to win the day - but these girls are professional riders who can deep-sit the saddle! Yeehaw, cowgirl!
tagline: Booty. Bounty. Bucking Beauties. A Long, Hard Tale of How The West Was Won.
title: Rawhide
